QuestData.Title: Rite of Strength
QuestData.Description: Behold, $n. The very presence of the Bristleback is a blight. Nothing is left in their wake but corpses and barren land. Camp Narache could become what we see here in but a few days, unless we stand and fight.$B$BThis will be your Rite of Strength; the first ceremony of a tauren brave. Go into the heart of the thornsnarl and kill Bristleback quilboar, then return to me.
QuestData.RewardText: You've fought well, $n. We may yet be saved.
